item.title: VoiceInk Updates
item.description:
VoiceInk v0.27 Release Notes

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 Rewrote the push-to-talk feature to always use the right option key for easier access

VoiceInk v0.26 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Push to Talk Feature
  • 🤝 A direct way to purchase and get pro version of the app

VoiceInk v0.25 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Initial Prompt Support: Enhance output quality with refined input prompts
  • 🤝 Discord Community Integration: Give feature requests as well as get support
